opening_theme: #2: "Atashin'chi no Uta (あたしンちの唄)" by Kyoko Koizumi (eps 145-297)
#3: "Proline Size♪ (プロリンサイズ♪)" by Morisanchu (eps 298-330)

#2: "LET'S GO! Atashin'chi (LET'S GO！あたしンち)" by The Tachibanas (ザ・タチバナーズ) (Kenichi Ogata, Fumiko Orikasa, Daisuke Sakaguchi, Kumiko Watanabe)
#3: "Hottottotto na Mainichi (ほっとっとっとな まいにち)" by Kigurumichiko (eps 233-304)
#4: "Proline Size♪ (プロリンサイズ♪)" by Morisanchu (eps 305-327)
